channel.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
channel.description:
Only in America would they get hyped up about stupid phenomena like this.
http://hosted.ap.org/dynamic/stories/U/US_TALKING_ABOUT_ZOMBIES?SECTION=HOME&SITE=AP&TEMPLATE=DEFAULT

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[s]and you said no major news corporation is talking about it, ap is a major news organisation

and correct me if I’m wrong but the hype he is talking about is also something you’ve posted about - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546130.0.html[/s]

actually nevermind you are correct

Read full topic

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows

item.description:
@Frell wrote:

He said only in America would “they” I figure he means everyone here including all the media.

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Frell:

Im sorry, here in America no major news corporations are talking about any zombies and its only the emo kids putting up bullshit signs like this.

By VICKI SMITH and TAMARA LUSH Associated Press

associated press
not a major news corporation
hahahahhaa

Read full topic
item.source: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:444026”]And no being attacked by someone is common. But MITB, think on the other side, what if this super human face eating dickhead owned a gun?[/quote]You know that you can obtain a gun ANYWAYS, right? Yano, like… drug dealers, rough niggaz, etc… If some jackass fucked up on bath salts can even use it…

Read full topic

Notice the massive incline at the very end.

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:4, topic:444026”]Moparisthebest: Have you remembered to buy a volcano insurance? Because you are arguing that just because something bad can happen, you need to be protected from it.[/quote]If I lived near an active volcano I sure as hell would buy volcano insurance…

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

No but if I lived near a volcano insurance companies in that area would cover that… For example: homes in the very middle of the US usually don’t have hurricane insurance, just hail and tornado.

And no being attacked by someone is common. But MITB, think on the other side, what if this super human face eating dickhead owned a gun?

Read full topic
item.source: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Moparisthebest: Have you remembered to buy a volcano insurance? Because you are arguing that just because something bad can happen, you need to be protected from it.

Read full topic
item.source: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows

item.title: After gory incidents, online 'zombie' talk grows
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Still, a very good reason to carry around a gun for protection. If a guy will eat your face off and seems to feel no pain, you need a gun.

Read full topic
